page.title: 10A DAY IN THE LIFE OF SIMON
page.content: I am ten year's old. My day starts at 7.30 am. My first task is to make my packed lunch for school . In my packed lunch I have wholemeal bread ham sandwiches , a kit kat, an apple and a packet of salt and vinegar crisps . I go and have breakfast, either corflakes or Readybrek.I leave for school at 8.18 a.m. I travel to school by bus arriving at 8.30. The school caretaker looks after us until 9.00. My favourite subjects are SMP maths, these are workcards, and art.My favorite break time activities are corner-crash or football.My hobbies are electronics and rounders. I like living here because I have lots of friends.There is the Grimmer where I can go fishing and I can go to the village shop and buy sweets.
